query: persons with residence and connections to the address (the crime scene) as owner, tenant, visitor, etc.

questions.question: Are there any known tenants residing at [adresse]?
Has anyone been observed visiting the property recently?

llm_output.reason: Document DOC_6 provides a physical description of the property but does not mention any individuals associated with it. Therefore, it does not directly answer the query about persons connected to the address.
llm_output.summary: The document describes the location and layout of the property at [adresse] in Bergen. It mentions details like a one-way street, driveway access points, a garage, an isolated room with a bed on the second floor of the garage, and a path leading to the northwest side of the house.

text: Eiendommen [adresse] ligger i X i Bergen. [adresse] er en smal gate som er enveiskjørt mot sør. På sørsiden av huset er det en gruslagt innkjørsel. Mot husets nordside er hagen benyttet som innkjørsel med underlag av jord og gress. Fra dette området er det en sti opp til husets nordvestlige side. I den sørlige delen av eiendommen er det en garasje og et uthus. Garasjens andre etasje har et isolert rom innredet med en seng.
memory: The document describes the location and layout of the property at [adresse] in Bergen. It mentions details like a one-way street, driveway access points, a garage, an isolated room with a bed on the second floor of the garage, and a path leading to the northwest side of the house.
